Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to prohibiting wireless telephone service plan termination fees in excess of fifty dollars
Summary: Prohibits wireless telephone service plan termination fees in excess of fifty dollars.
LawCode: Add ยง399-k, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting wireless telephone service plan termination fees in excess of fifty dollars
